title: Title *
add_up_to_10_tags: Add up to 10 tags to describe your content.
please_provide_an_email: Please provide an email address where you may be contacted. This address will be publically displayed with your app.

i_acknowledge_that_my_software: I acknowledge that my software application may be subject to United States export laws, regardless of my location or nationality. I agree that I will comply with all such laws, including any requirements for software with encryption functions. I hereby certify that my application is authorized for export from the United States under these laws.
